title: Feta and pancetta stuffed chicken breasts
ingredients: ['8 tablespoons olive oil', '1 dessertspoon lemon juice', '4 cloves crushed garlic', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '4 slices feta cheese', '4 slices pancetta, fried and drained']
